Reset Revision History Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Select Edit»VI Revision History to display the History window. Click the Reset button to display the Reset Revision History dialog box. You must have at least one revision comment logged in the history before you can access the Reset Revision History dialog box.

Use this dialog box to reset the revision history and revision number for a VI.

This dialog box includes the following component:

  • Also reset revision number—Resets the revision number. If you remove the checkmark from this checkbox, LabVIEW erases the VI history without resetting the revision number.
